page_description.title: Contact Me
page_description.description: Want to contact me? Follow the form below and I will get back to you!

forms.name: "I am from [company name here] and I'm looking to sell you [product here]"
forms.message: I don't accept sales pitches via e-mail. Sorry!

forms.name: I'd like to ask a question
forms.warning: I may not respond instantly; I will try and respond whenever possible. Additionally, make sure to try and go as in depth with the question as possible since it may save time in the long run.

forms.name: I'd like to file a bug report
forms.message: Please do that on the GitHub/support page of the appropriate project.

forms.name: Can you build me a bot to do [function here]?
forms.message: I don't build bots for people for free (except for friends). If you want to discuss a commercial bot, use the "I'd like to discuss something else" option and very clearly explain what it is you want me to do.

forms.name: I'd like to discuss something else
